title: Thunderous hydra:
body:
tiamat + recurve bow

Unique-- CLEAVE: Basic attacks deal 10% of your total attack damage and apply a stack of thunder for 10 seconds to units in a line behind your target. Bonus damage and a stack of thunder is not applied to the target of your auto attack. 

_same range, width, and speed as ez q, but pass through. Visual is like sorceress charged bolt in diablo 2, except in a line._

Active-- CRESCENT: Expunges stacks of thunder on enemy units, causing them to be struck by lightning, dealing magic damage equal to 50% of your bonus attack damage per stack. 30 second cooldown
